website_summaries.verdict: The longest slackline obstacle course you can find with eight different obstacles to challenge young ninjas.
pros: A 65-ft. obstacle course with a rope ladder, gymnastic rings, spinning wheel, two types of monkey bars, and hanging rings
This will challenge even the most daring young ninja
cons: This doesn’t appear to have much UV resistance, which limits it to shady areas or inside

customer_reviews.title: Ripped line
customer_reviews.text: We installed this in our gym. We used metal trusses to secure the line. 3 kids went on the line (one at a time) all under 100 lbs. when the 4th kid (approx 130 lbs) attempted the line, the line completely ripped in half! The line is rated for 250 lbs but broke under a 150 lb kid! Very disappointed. Concerned my line was dry rotted or defective.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta

customer_reviews.title: Train like a Ninja
customer_reviews.text: Useful and fun. Durability TBD. I erected mine on a hang frame. Users; 2 teens under 120 lbs and 4 adults up to 165 lbs.. We didn’t use it often, maybe 20 times. Line bows too much in the middle for heavier guys. Next time I put it up I will shorten it so it stays more level and doesn’t bow. Durable? Erected it, then didn’t for 3 weeks. Sat in the under tension. When we used it we noticed the top of the web sheds fibers when the sliding rings are used. It appears to be from UV weakening the web + ring Friction. This would probably be great if erected in shade. But in the sun?... TBD.
customer_reviews.author: G. Slominski

customer_reviews.title: High quality materials!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in an effort to get some energy out of my three boys. Very pleased to see that the product was well made and not just cheap plastic. Comes with clear instructions on how to set it up. I'm excited to have this in our backyard for years to come!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer W

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: My boys love this. The items are well made. We set it up in less than 15 minutes. We bought an additional slack line so that they are able to walk the course instead of swinging from it. We have very large trees, so the tree protectors did not fit. We have not noticed any damage to the trees.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have for all climbers
customer_reviews.text: Love this my daughter was so happy every thing is in box that was on photo. Very High Quality!!! I was very impressed when I opened the box it was well packed and all of the equipment is sturdy, smooth, perfect for anyone to climb on. My daughter is a rock wall climber this is to help keep her upper body in shape during shelter in place. This is worth its money I am happy I got this one and not a cheaper one. I do recommend also getting the climb rope with this.
customer_reviews.author: Vera L Greenwood

customer_reviews.title: Cool but could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Very cool fun item for a backyard with strong trees! Very good quality stuff. I think it should last a long time. I asked their customer service for some help and they immediately responded. They were very helpful. A few things could definitely be BETTER: 1. For the 65' version, there should definitely be more obstacles provided. 5. The tree protector rings ought to be longer. 5. The rope ladder could be better made; it's too hinky. But anyway, it's cool and fun! I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You and your kids will love this!
customer_reviews.text: This took about 10 minutes to figure out both how to attach it between two trees and place all the anchors. Once we figured out the anchors, my daughter was playing for the next hour! It is also sturdy enough for adults...it will wear you out! Great family fun!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality wheel rope
customer_reviews.text: So sad, my kids finally got to use the course after waiting since Christmas for warmer weather.... while a child, who may be a whooping 40 lbs, was on the wheel, the wheel rope snapped. He feel to the ground... luckily he is ok. So disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Secret Sister

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Customer Service, Generously Sized
customer_reviews.text: I had a question for the manufacturer, and heard back from them the same day with a very helpful answer, which really impressed me. The item itself is what it should be, a super-fun obstacle course that our stuck-at-home kids love so far. Notably, the 65' advertised length is conservative. We set our line up between two large-diameter trees 50' apart, and there is plenty of excess slack line.
customer_reviews.author: "jad22805"

customer_reviews.title: I think it needs a thicker band that doesn’t stretch so much
customer_reviews.text: We have tightened the band as tight as possible but if my 70 pound grandson hangs in the center of these webbing band he touches the ground. We have to have all the equipment to the end of the band to be able to use the it. A 250 pound person could never be able to hang on this Ninja obstacle course. I am also missing the monkey fist. Don’t believe it worth the money I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Griffiths

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My 2 sons love this set. They haven’t been able to complete it yet but that’s to be expected but they are getting better at it and enjoy trying.
customer_reviews.author: jammie

customer_reviews.title: Unable to give a full review at this time.
customer_reviews.text: I just gave this to my daughter for Easter today. I'm not sure about the set, but the bag to hold everything is ripped. Not sure if it came that way or is made cheap and not durable enough to hold the equipment. I'll update my post after I try out the equipment.
customer_reviews.author: John J. Roche

customer_reviews.title: Fun thing to have but needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: Great idea but i wish there were more options. Also it takes two people to install unless you ate a pro at these. Relatively clear instructions. The swing bar is pretty thin. Would be better if it was a thicker piece. It hurts my child and she cannot swing for long.
customer_reviews.author: Oksana D.

customer_reviews.title: FUN!
customer_reviews.text: I weigh 145lbs. and being Dad had to test it myself after attaching It to the trees outback. it held me just fine. little hard. and could have come with better instructions. other than that awesome product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: a great product. My boy loves it. The longer you make the course the more it sags so we tinked with it a bit and then had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ford

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner course.
customer_reviews.text: Is a great beginner course, just thought it might have a little more obstacles for the price. I did make a few more out of rope and softballs with my son, it was a fun side project.
customer_reviews.author: Slacker Mark

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Great fun for the kids- instructions suck! But after watching a few YouTube videos I finally got it up and my six year old and 4 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Florida mom

customer_reviews.title: A great apparatus for kids to get exercise!
customer_reviews.text: It is sturdy and our 4-year-old loves it! Can do all of it yet but she will grow into some of the things. It builds confidence.
customer_reviews.author: suzanne

customer_reviews.title: it is interesting
customer_reviews.text: it has to be a certain height because it bows under weight
customer_reviews.author: vanessa meacham

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as we expected.
customer_reviews.text: Hurt my son's hands. Hard to make tight enough for 10 year old to hang from without hitting his feet on ground. Whole thing bounces up when son let's go or falls off. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: megan webber

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loves it !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 7 year old grandson who loves ninja warrier. The quality is very good and it will be able to grow with him he gets older by just moving the height and adding more obstacles. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: tamio

customer_reviews.title: Kids love this
customer_reviews.text: Such great value. easy to install and great quality. there is a decent amount of sag so we ended up rigging to taller trees.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Massey

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to put up. A lot of flexibility in spacing the obstacles to fit the users size and body type. My kids love it. Excellent customer service. Very responsive to questions.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Koenigsberg

customer_reviews.title: So fun!!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful company to work with! Obstacle course is great quality and my kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: nancy durre

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe, strap is faulty
customer_reviews.text: After a few months of use, the main strap snapped in half while child climbing across.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Barrick

product_meta.title: Ninja Warrior Obstacle Course for Kids - 65' Longest Ninja Slackline Obstacle Course | 9 Obstacles | Ninja Line Jungle Gym with Spinning Wheel | Outdoor Play Equipment for Kids (65 Foot with Wheel)
feature_bullets: 💪 MORE ROOM FOR FUN - Our Custom Ninja Warrior Course is the LONGEST AVAILABLE at 65 feet, giving your ninja kids more room to train. Build your course any way you want, then use the freestyle rings to fill a gap or extend the course! The wheel can be a challenging obstacle or a fun way to unwind outside.

💪 SAFETY FIRST - Other companies talk about safety but Fofana takes it SERIOUSLY. We test every batch to ensure products meet our high standards for quality. Your family's safety is too important. Don't take a chance on flimsy components. Rest assured there's NO WEAK LINKS in our kit.

💪 ADJUSTABLE - We invented ADJUSTABLE ATTACHMENTS so kids can create their own custom Ninja Line. Obstacles can be set up close together or far apart and can be endlessly rearranged. We don't use SLIDING BUCKLES because they're NOT SAFE. Our carabiners attach directly to the webbing and can hold over 1000 pounds.

💪 QUICK AND EASY SETUP - Perfect for large or small yards. You just need 2 strong healthy trees spaced 10 to 55 feet apart and at least 1 foot in diameter. Enjoy it in your backyard, at the park, campground, beach, almost anywhere. Our ninja slack line can be set up in less than 15 minutes and take down is even quicker.

💪 ENDLESS FUN - Kids LOVE it, and even forget about electronics (sometimes)! Our kit has an exciting assortment of the most popular and fun obstacles. Get kids OUTSIDE and moving while they build strength, coordination, and confidence. It's MORE FUN than monkey bars and swing sets and SAFER than a zip line.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars108 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
